meanings.definition: To officially suggest someone for a position or honor.
meanings.sent1: She nominated her friend for the student council.
meanings.sent2: The committee nominated him for the leadership role.
meanings.sent3: The cat nominated the dog as the best treat hunter.
meanings.sent4: The sun nominated itself as the brightest star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher nominated the hardworking student for the award.

meanings.definition: To name someone as a candidate for an award or election.
meanings.sent1: They nominated her for the prestigious award.
meanings.sent2: The party nominated him as their candidate for mayor.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel nominated the bird for the fastest flyer award.
meanings.sent4: The mountain nominated itself as the tallest peak in the range.
meanings.sent5: The coach nominated the dedicated player for the MVP title.
